This is a highly stable, agile VTOL, a necessity for advanced pilots. You can download the VTOL @ my dropbox account if your interested. Its design is similar to that of my avatar.![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)https://www.dropbox.com/sh/txskv3hn1n84kbv/AABUm0yP5UqY0hszCYXheWkIa?dl=0

Hey, what the?

I'm watching you. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T23:51:59Z" title="03/11/2015 11:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
  
\*Someone's\* been using my laptop... XD

I simply do not understand how you can make something look completely awesome and still fly amazingly!

If I make something cool it crashes repeatedly until i get bored. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

If I make something functional it looks utterly boring and I go back to making cool looking stuff. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
**Feedback would be greatly appreciated. In addition, I am accepting future designs so send me a pic of something you would like me to create and I can build you a futuristic functional VTOL.**
